English: <color=#FFD700>Blades clashing, paired with wine.</color> <color=#DC143C>Blood debts repaid in blood.</color>
Chinese: <color=#FFD700>；刀光剑影，可作下酒</color>；<color=#DC143C>血债血偿</color>

English: All Critical hits trigger <sprite name="zuiJianKeMod_B_zjk_T_9_Icon"><color=#778899>Critical Hit</color> (<color=#778899>Critical</color> base 100% damage increase, excess Critical rate added directly to this portion. <color=#dda0dd><sprite name="zuiJianKeMod_B_zjk_T_7_Icon">Bloodbloom Plumage</color> provides only 20%). For skills with original cost of 3 Mana or higher, non-base <sprite name="zuiJianKeMod_B_zjk_T_9_Icon"><color=#778899>Critical</color> damage increase is halved.
Chinese:
所有暴击引发<sprite name="zuiJianKeMod_B_zjk_T_9_Icon"><color=#778899>会心暴击</color>（<color=#778899>会心</color>基础100%增伤，溢出的暴击率直接加在这部分，<color=#dda0dd><sprite name="zuiJianKeMod_B_zjk_T_7_Icon">血绽红梅</color>仅提供20%）。
对于原始费用为3费及以上的技能，<sprite name="zuiJianKeMod_B_zjk_T_9_Icon"><color=#778899>会心</color>非基础增伤减半。

English: When dealing damage, apply 1 <sprite name="zuiJianKeMod_B_zjk_T_7_Icon"><color=#dda0dd>Bloodbloom Plumage</color> and 1 <sprite name="zuiJianKeMod_B_zjk_T_8_Icon"><color=#DC143C>Bleeding</color>. Excess <sprite name="zuiJianKeMod_B_zjk_T_8_Icon"><color=#DC143C>Bleeding</color> immediately deals &a damage.
Chinese: 造成伤害时，施加1<sprite name="zuiJianKeMod_B_zjk_T_7_Icon"><color=#dda0dd>血绽红梅</color>与1<sprite name="zuiJianKeMod_B_zjk_T_8_Icon"><color=#DC143C>出血</color>，溢出的<sprite name="zuiJianKeMod_B_zjk_T_8_Icon"><color=#DC143C>出血</color>立刻造成&a点伤害。
无法行动，受到攻击时解除

English:
Attacks always miss.
<sprite name="zuiJianKeMod_Ex_zjk_0_Icon"><color=#9400D3>Flaying Execution</color> always crits.
<sprite name="zuiJianKeMod_B_zjk_T_9_Icon"><color=#778899>Critical</color> damage fixed at 80%.
<color=#FFD700><sprite name="zuiJianKeMod_j1QNlI5rYT">Exhilaration</color> effect becomes 1.5x.
Using held attack skills inflicts &a (14% max HP) Pain damage.
<color=#4169E1>A swordsman's wrath leaves no survivors within ten paces.</color>
Chinese:
攻击必定未命中
<sprite name="zuiJianKeMod_Ex_zjk_0_Icon"><color=#9400D3>磔诛</color>必定暴击
<sprite name="zuiJianKeMod_B_zjk_T_9_Icon"><color=#778899>会心</color>增伤固定为80%
<color=#FFD700><sprite name="zuiJianKeMod_j1QNlI5rYT">快意</color>的效果变为1.5倍
释放自己手中的攻击技能时受到&a(14%最大生命值)点痛苦伤害。
<color=#4169E1>剑客一怒，十步无存</color>

English:
When crit, gain <sprite name="zuiJianKeMod_B_zjk_T_8_Icon"><color=#DC143C>Bleeding</color> based on stacks.
<color=#dda0dd>Plum blossoms bloom on the blade, their fragrance lingers.</color>
Chinese:
被暴击时根据层数获得<sprite name="zuiJianKeMod_B_zjk_T_8_Icon"><color=#DC143C>出血</color>
<color=#dda0dd>剑锋绽梅，其香悠然</color=#dda0dd>

English:
Critical strikes trigger <sprite name="zuiJianKeMod_B_zjk_T_9_Icon"><color=#778899>Critical Hit</color> (<color=#778899>Critical</color> base 120% damage increase, excess Critical rate added directly. <color=#dda0dd><sprite name="zuiJianKeMod_B_zjk_T_7_Icon">Bloodbloom Plumage</color> provides only 20%).
<color=#778899>Peerless yet unremarkable.</color>
Chinese:
致命攻击引发<sprite name="zuiJianKeMod_B_zjk_T_9_Icon"><color=#778899>会心暴击</color>（<color=#778899>会心</color>基础120%增伤，溢出的暴击率直接加在这部分，<color=#dda0dd><sprite name="zuiJianKeMod_B_zjk_T_7_Icon">血绽红梅</color>仅提供20%）。
<color=#778899>天下无双，何足挂齿</color>

English:
When missing attacks, gain <sprite name="zuiJianKeMod_j1QNlI5rYT"><color=#FFD700>Exhilaration</color> (increases Critical damage).
At battle start, gain <sprite name="zuiJianKeMod_B_zjk_T_9_Icon"><color=#778899>Nameless Swordsmanship</color> (enhances Critical hits).
Non-exclusive 2+ Mana skills gain <sprite name="zuiJianKeMod_S_zjk_1_0_Icon"><color=#87CEEB>Breathing Technique</color> (guaranteed hit, Critical).
All deck skills gain <sprite name="zuiJianKeMod_Ex_zjk_0_Icon"><color=#9400D3>Flaying Execution</color> (half damage on miss, full on crit).
Base Critical damage starts at 100%. Non-base Hit Rate converts to double Critical Rate. Non-base Critical Rate converts to Attack (max 30%).
Chinese:
每次未命中时，获得<sprite name="zuiJianKeMod_j1QNlI5rYT"><color=#FFD700>快意（增加暴击伤害）</color>
战斗开始时，获得<sprite name="zuiJianKeMod_B_zjk_T_9_Icon"><color=#778899>无名剑术（强化致命暴击）</color>
2费及以上的非专属技能被<sprite name="zuiJianKeMod_S_zjk_1_0_Icon"><color=#87CEEB>呼吸法（必中，致命）</color>加持
所有牌库内技能附带<sprite name="zuiJianKeMod_Ex_zjk_0_Icon"><color=#9400D3>磔诛（未命中仍造成一半伤害，暴击时满额伤害）</color>
战斗开始时，基础暴击伤害变为100%，非基础命中率转而提升两倍的暴击率，非基础暴击率转而提升攻击力（最高30%）

English:
The swordsman calls himself "Blade Pilgrim," emerging from crimson mists. During a Twisted Lands investigation, the team encountered him.

Scarlet hills, blood-streams, and a sword-bearing figure formed their first impression.

"This damned place—full of beasts that don't speak."
He stepped over corpses.
The team watched him approach... 

"Fight to know."
Later, he said.

His style adapts, Critical-focused. Excels in single-target damage and amplifying allies' Criticals.
Can lead or support.
Chinese:
执剑者自称“剑客”，自血雾中而来。
某次，在对扭曲之地的调查中，调查团遇见了“剑客”。

猩红色的土丘，鲜血汇成的数条溪流，举着葫芦沉吟的执剑者，构成了调查团对他的最初印象。

“鬼地方，尽是些不通人言的。”
言罢，踱步越过遍野的尸骸。
调查团看到“剑客”提剑缓缓走来....

“不打不相识。”
后来，“剑客”是这么说的。

剑客的招式灵活，战斗风格多变，以暴击作为唯一的输出底色。
拥有提供极大量单体输出，同时兼备增幅队友暴击的能力，可以选择作为团队的主攻手或掠阵者。

English: No, no. I'll teach you a move or two later.
Chinese: 不可不可，回头我教你两式。

English: This blade claims lives in three steps.
Hell's bailiffs can't keep me—how dare Death claim you?
Chinese: 阴差难留我，阎王怎许你活！

English: I owe you one—will repay it soon.
Chinese: 人情我记下了，不日定还。

English: Hesitation is the bane of swordsmanship!
Chinese: 踌躇之于剑术，乃是大忌！

English: The dishonorable deserve no mercy in death.
Chinese: 不仁无义者，死亦不足惜。

English: Such marvels are common here? Fascinating...
Chinese: 如此奇人异兽，于此地竟算不得稀罕，有趣....
荒郊野岭，人迹罕至....此地最宜埋尸。

English: Swords suit me best—these are for comrades.
Chinese: 剑最趁手，这些交予同道罢。
此地将起事么？何故将兵刃藏于角落。

English: This place... not what I imagined.
Wandering free, leaving no ties behind.
Chinese: 愿做人间逍遥客，从此江湖无故人。

English: Why persist? Only one leaves alive.
Chinese: 何苦来哉，恩怨算罢，你我只好活一个了。
哼，了却一桩江湖事....烦心，烦心。

English: Tolerable—less harsh than hunger or cold.
Chinese: 无妨，尚不及饥寒伤病，不过尔尔。

English: [A]In this foreign land, call me Blade Pilgrim.
[B]Blade Pilgrim... Do you kill as easily as breathing?
Chinese: [B]剑客....你把杀人当作喝水吃饭吗。

English: [A]A blade should dull—too sharp harms wielder and foe.
Chinese: [A]剑总归要钝些，锋芒太盛，易伤人伤己。

English: [B]Nonsense! A sword that can't kill is useless!
Chinese: [B]啰里啰唆！拿剑砍不死人还有什么用！
[A]杀鸡屠狗而已，利剑只算趁手。
[B]....你的技术，也能教给其他调查员吗？
[A]这剑术师出无门，没甚忌讳，自是可行。
[A]为何学剑，你那兵器奇绝险绝，恐难逢敌手。

English: [B]Whoa! So I'm strong too? Trade lessons for chainsaw skills?
Chinese: [B]哇塞！是说我也很强的意思吗，那我教你用电锯怎么样？
[A]怪哉，大鸟开口能言....定是醉了。
[B]信仰神吧，神会消除所有的恶。

English: [A]Absurd. My blade has righted countless wrongs—where was God?
Chinese: [A]可笑，某平生仗剑，已雠不义难数，未见所谓神助耶？

English: [A]The mortal world needs no gods meddling.
Chinese: [A]哼，人间唯正道一途，难容神鬼染指。

English: [A]Entrusting my blind spot to others? Unwise.
Chinese: [A]某空将一剑行于江湖，空门托予他人，不擅。
[A]以痛止痛,而肉白骨....神乎其技。

English: [A]In my world, this skill could buy countless lives.
Chinese: [A]若在江湖，此技可买人命不数。
[B]见鬼，朋友，你是打哪儿来的怪物。
[A]嗯？何出此言？我与阁下并无瓜葛。

English: [B]I can't even aim... How many have you killed?
Chinese: [B]我都来不及瞄准....你用剑杀过多少人？
[A]人偶的行迹，有时似乎同那些丝线无关。

English: [A]Assassins I know are bold—abandoning half a life to kill one, content with a single知己 (kindred spirit).
Chinese: [A]我所闻的刺客大都豪迈洒脱，弃半生，杀一人，凭一字知己足矣。

English: [A]Who knows? Kindred spirits recognize each other.
Chinese: [A]呵呵，谁说的准，若人在天底下存着知己，一眼便可知。

English: Prioritize drawing 2 attack skills from deck. User gains 1 <sprite name="zuiJianKeMod_j1QNlI5rYT"><color=#FFD700>Exhilaration</color>.
Chinese: 从牌库中优先抽取2个攻击技能，使技能拥有者获得1<sprite name="zuiJianKeMod_j1QNlI5rYT"><color=#FFD700>快意</color>。

English:
If missed, may recast this turn and draw 1 card.
Only usable after casting 1+ Mana skills.
(Cannot crit on hit)
Chinese:
未命中时，本回合内可重复释放，同时抽一张牌
仅在释放手中一费以上技能后可用
（命中时无法暴击）。

English:
For this battle, grant adjacent attack skills <sprite name="zuiJianKeMod_S_zjk_1_0_Icon"><color=#87CEEB>Breathing Technique</color>.
User gains <sprite name="zuiJianKeMod_B_zjk_T_9_Icon"><color=#87CEEB>Nameless Swordsmanship</color>. If failed, take &a (25% max HP) Pain damage and draw 1 card.
Chinese:
本场战斗内，为相邻攻击技能附加<sprite name="zuiJianKeMod_S_zjk_1_0_Icon"><color=#87CEEB>呼吸法</color>，并使技能的拥有者获得<sprite name="zuiJianKeMod_B_zjk_T_9_Icon"><color=#87CEEB>无名剑术</color>。
若未附加<sprite name="zuiJianKeMod_S_zjk_1_0_Icon"><color=#87CEEB>呼吸法</color>，则转而受到&a(最大生命值25%)点痛苦伤害，并且抽一张牌。

English:
Play immediately when drawn.
<color=#FFD700><sprite name="zuiJianKeMod_j1QNlI5rYT">Exhilaration</color> instead increases <sprite name="zuiJianKeMod_B_zjk_T_7_Icon"><color=#dda0dd>Bloodbloom Plumage</color> stack cap.
Chinese:
抽到时立即释放。
<color=#FFD700><sprite name="zuiJianKeMod_j1QNlI5rYT">快意</color>转而提升<sprite name="zuiJianKeMod_B_zjk_T_7_Icon"><color=#dda0dd>血绽红梅</color>层数上限。

English: If missed, perform an additional attack with doubled base Critical rate and <sprite name="zuiJianKeMod_S_zjk_1_0_Icon"><color=#87CEEB>Breathing Technique</color>.
Chinese: 未命中时，额外追加一次基础暴击率翻倍且附带<sprite name="zuiJianKeMod_S_zjk_1_0_Icon"><color=#87CEEB>呼吸法</color>的攻击。

English:
<color=#9400D3><sprite name="zuiJianKeMod_Ex_zjk_0_Icon">Flaying Execution</color> deals full damage.
Attack adjacent enemies.
On hit/fix, add 1 <sprite name="zuiJianKeMod_B_zjk_T_7_Icon"><color=#dda0dd>Bloodbloom Plumage</color>.
Chinese:
<color=#9400D3><sprite name="zuiJianKeMod_Ex_zjk_0_Icon">磔诛</color>造成满额伤害。
同时攻击目标两侧的敌人。
命中或固定时额外添加一层<sprite name="zuiJianKeMod_B_zjk_T_7_Icon"><color=#dda0dd>血绽红梅</color>。

English:
If this skill hits, may recast this turn.
Any skill crit grants this skill <sprite name="zuiJianKeMod_S_zjk_1_0_Icon"><color=#87CEEB>Breathing Technique</color>.
Chinese:
本技能命中时，本回合内可再次释放。
任意技能暴击时，该技能获得<sprite name="zuiJianKeMod_S_zjk_1_0_Icon"><color=#87CEEB>呼吸法</color>。

English: Inflict 1/3 of target's total Pain buff damage.
Chinese: 附加目标一回合痛苦增益伤害总和的三分之一。

English:
Grant Swiftness to a skill. User gains +1 Overload.
If no owned skills in hand, draw 1. When played from hand, prioritize drawing 1 attack skill and grant it Exclude.
Consume 1 <sprite name="zuiJianKeMod_j1QNlI5rYT"><color=#FFD700>Exhilaration</color> to draw +1 attack card.
Chinese:
选择一个技能变为迅速，技能的拥有者过载+1。
若手中没有自己的技能，则抽1个自己的技能。
在手中打出时，改为优先抽取1个攻击技能，并将自身放逐，若可消耗1<sprite name="zuiJianKeMod_j1QNlI5rYT"><color=#FFD700>快意</color>，则消耗，多抽1张攻击牌。

English: If target isn't Blade Pilgrim, grant 1 <sprite name="zuiJianKeMod_j1QNlI5rYT"><color=#FFD700>Exhilaration</color> and Stun.
Chinese: 若目标非剑客，令其额外获得一层<sprite name="zuiJianKeMod_j1QNlI5rYT"><color=#FFD700>快意</color>，并且陷入眩晕。</color>

English: Follow with Flesh Severance attacks equal to cost
Chinese: 追加肉斩消耗费用次攻击

English:
<color=#87CEEB>[Breathing Technique]</color>
Repeat <color=#DC143C>Flesh Severance</color> attacks equal to cost.
Chinese:
<color=#87CEEB>【呼吸法】</color>
重复<color=#DC143C>肉斩</color>消耗费用次攻击。

English:
<color=#87CEEB>[Breathing Technique]</color>
If enemies prepare to attack during countdown, immediately cast <color=#DC143C>Flesh and Bone Severance</color> and gain +1 Overload per turn for 3 turns.

<color=#DC143C>Flesh cleaved, bones severed.</color>
Chinese:
<color=#87CEEB>【呼吸法】</color>
若在倒计时期间有敌人将要发动攻击，则立刻转而释放<color=#DC143C>肉斩骨断</color>，且回合开始过载+1，持续三回合。

<color=#DC143C>剔骨剔肉，肉斩骨断</color>

English:
Grant all damage skills <sprite name="zuiJianKeMod_Ex_zjk_0_Icon"><color=#9400D3>Flaying Execution</color>.
When played from hand, <sprite name="zuiJianKeMod_B_zjk_T_5_Icon"><color=#4169E1>Wrath</color> lasts 1 turn. Gain +1 Mana per <sprite name="zuiJianKeMod_S_zjk_1_0_Icon"><color=#87CEEB>Breathing Technique</color> skill in hand.
Chinese:
为自身所有伤害技能附加<sprite name="zuiJianKeMod_Ex_zjk_0_Icon"><color=#9400D3>磔诛</color>。
从手中打出时，<sprite name="zuiJianKeMod_B_zjk_T_5_Icon"><color=#4169E1>怒</color>仅为1回合，手中每有一个<sprite name="zuiJianKeMod_S_zjk_1_0_Icon"><color=#87CEEB>呼吸法</color>技能，回复1点费用。

English:
<color=#87CEEB>[Breathing Technique]</color>
When using 2+ Mana skills from hand, grant them <sprite name="zuiJianKeMod_S_zjk_1_0_Icon"><color=#87CEEB>Breathing Technique</color>, -3 Mana, 100% Critical rate, and +1 base damage.

Any skill crit consumes its <sprite name="zuiJianKeMod_S_zjk_1_0_Icon"><color=#87CEEB>Breathing Technique</color>, +1 Mana, and adds a guaranteed non-crit <color=#DC143C>Stab</color>.

<color=#DC143C>Amateurs watch the blade—masters strike.</color>
Chinese:
<color=#87CEEB>【呼吸法】</color>
从手中使用2费及以上的技能时，该技能获得<sprite name="zuiJianKeMod_S_zjk_1_0_Icon"><color=#87CEEB>呼吸法</color>，同时 -3费，获得100%暴击率与1点基础伤害。

任意技能暴击时，立刻消耗此技能的<sprite name="zuiJianKeMod_S_zjk_1_0_Icon"><color=#87CEEB>呼吸法</color>，同时+1费，追加一次必中且无法暴击的<color=#DC143C>刺</color>。

<color=#DC143C>小成用眼，大成用刺。</color=#DC143C>

English: <color=#9400D3>Deals half damage on miss. A thousand cuts flay flesh.</color>
Chinese:
<color=#9400D3>未命中时造成一半的伤害
千剜加身，皮肉皆散</color>

English:
<color=#87CEEB>[Guaranteed Hit][Critical]
Grants Nameless Swordsmanship.
Spirit focused, blade drawn—enemy perishes.</color>
Chinese:
<color=#87CEEB>【必中】【致命】
使用后，获得无名剑术
神凝于气，剑出，敌，立毙。</color>

English: Attack skills costing 1 Mana or less

Chinese: 技能命中，对目标施加一层<color=#dda0dd>血绽红梅</color>

English:
<color=#87CEEB>[Breathing Technique]</color> Multiplier: 50%.
Perform follow-up attacks based on Flesh Severance's cost.
Paralysis: Cannot act, -100% Dodge Rate, +100% Critical Received Rate, lasts for one action.
Chinese:
<color=#87CEEB>【呼吸法】</color>倍率：50%
根据肉斩消耗费用进行追击
麻痹：无法行动，闪避率-100%，被暴击率+100%，持续一次行动
